svg.class: lucide lucide-chevron-down ml-1 h-3 w-3 group-hover:text-emerald-600
svg.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; height: 12px; stroke: oklch(0.129 0.042 264.695); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible; width: 12px

path.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; stroke: oklch(0.129 0.042 264.695); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible
